        public java.lang.String getSQLString(sql_quoter quoter)
        Converts the value of this object into an SQL literal or (if appropriate) a comma-separated list of SQL literals. Different databases have different rules on how to escape (or not to escape) various characters within string literals; specify the type of quoting with quoter.
